::DarkMouse::

She woke up and found herself laying infront of the bunker.  She had 
no memeory of walking or crawling there.  She slowly got to her feet. 
She walked inside the bunker, leaving a diminishing trail of mech 
fluid.  By the time she was entering into the main roomof the bunker, 
her wounds had healed up fully and her strength had returned to her.  
She went around looking for Aracnia.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron sniffed the air around the doors to the great cavern. 
So far 
> they had not met any troble...but they had just gotten to the cave 
after all. 
> Waspinator also buzzed frantically around the cavern.
>     "How do we get in, Megatron?" Waspinator said in his insect 
bizz voice. 
> He was getting on the tyrants nerves.
>     Megatron didnt answer, but instead rapped on the door and 
waited for an 
> answer.
> 
>     Aracnia looked to her new....um...intrest, Quickstrike. She had 
indeed 
> made new improvements on the base....but tarantulas was missing.
>     "Have you seen Tarantulas at all, Quickstrike? Aerostreak?" She 
asked, 
> looking around the room.
> 
>     Tarantulas dumped Darkmouse onto the ground at the mouth of the 
bunker. 
> She would be safe here, for now he had other things to do.
